#include<iostream>
#include<map>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	int t,n;
	string s;
	map<string, int> m;
	map<string, int>::iterator it;
	
	cin >> t;
	
	while(t--) {
		cin >> n;
		
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++) {
			cin >> s;
			if(m.find(s)==m.end()) m[s]=1;
			else m[s]++;
		}
		
		int ans = 0;
		
		for(it = m.begin(); it!=m.end(); it++) {
			if(it->second%2!=0) ans++;
		}
		
		cout<<ans<<endl;
	}
	
	return 0;
}
